name: Luís Custódio
body:
### Welcome to 'todo Blog!'
This is a blog about internet, tech, travel, photography, life and void.

### What's the idea about?
Software development is a fun/pain full life time involvement.
As I don't want to have fun/pain alone I'll try to give some. 

### C# | ruby
I learned to like programming with C#, I start to love TDD, ruby rocks with TDD.

### Authors and Contributors
The blog is open but the main contributor (with broken english) will be me (@lcustodio).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
